about_the_game:
Slime Virus Defense brings a fresh twist to the tower defense genre. Your mission is to protect your computer from waves of virus-like slimes that come in small, medium, and large sizes. But you’re not alone! Animal towers with 9 unique classes—Poison, Ranger, Sniper, Fire, Hybrid, Line Magic, Splash Magic, Pure Magic, and Ice Magic—are here to help. Each class has different skills and abilities, and deals varying damage depending on the size of the slime.

Strategic planning is key as each stage presents different slime types and terrain challenges. Players must adapt their tower placements and upgrade paths carefully to overcome the increasing difficulty. Defeating slimes rewards you with upgrade points, allowing you to enhance the stats of your towers and improve your defense.

Additionally, you can access the in-game “Dictionary” page to review detailed stats of all towers, slimes, and skills, helping you make informed decisions to fine-tune your strategy.

Key Features:

- 2D defense strategy with a unique animal tower concept

- 9 tower classes, each with distinct abilities and skills

- Slimes of different sizes (small, medium, large) require adaptive strategies

- Use upgrade points to improve your towers' performance

- Diverse stages with varying terrain and slime types

- In-game "Dictionary" to view detailed stats of towers, slimes, and skills

- Single-player experience with increasing difficulty
